text: evarkal, allah tan arulal tankalukku valankiya porulkalil kancattanam ceykirarkalo avarkal atu tankalukku nallatu enru ennivita ventam. Atu avarkalukkut tinkakave irukkum. Kancattanattal certta porul marumaiyil avarkal kaluttil arikantamaka (irumpu valaiyamaka) mattappatum. Vanankal pumiyin varicurimai allahvukke uriyatu. Allah ninkal ceypavarrai ellam nankarintavan avan
